name: So Much Stuff 4: Bits & Bobs
description:
Rediscover the thrill of finding "So Much Stuff" in this fourth installment!

Explore beautifully crafted levels, clear diverse scenes, and relish in a multitude of engaging mini-games. Collect charming trinkets to adorn a fresh room in "So Much Stuff 4: Bits and Bobs."

Features

  • Play over 100 games!
  • Downloadable wallpapers
  • Make gameplay simpler with Help and Hint functions!

Collector's Edition

  • includes 8 extra themes
  • 18 Downloadable Wallpapers
  • Full soundtrack and music player
  • 1 more collection room

Get ready for another delightful sorting adventure!
